property.name: NORMAL
property.shortdesc: Uses traditional process inks and most spot inks.

property.name: OPAQUE
property.shortdesc: Uses heavy, nontransparent inks to prevent trapping of underlying colors but allow for trapping along the edges of the ink. Best for metallic inks.

property.name: TRANSPARENT
property.shortdesc: Uses clear inks to ensure that underlying items trap. Best for varnishes and dieline inks.

property.name: OPAQUE_IGNORE
property.shortdesc: Uses heavy, nontransparent inks to prevent trapping of underlying colors but allow for trapping along the edges of the ink. Best for inks that have undesirable interactions with other inks.
